headline: Chevron, SLB Deals Signal U.S. Return to Iraqi Oilfields
summary: The U.S. and allies are ramping up energy and infrastructure deals to bolster ties with Iraq and its semi-autonomous Kurdistan region.

headline: Potassium Formate Company Evaluation Report 2025 | SLB, Eastman Chemical, and Perstorp Lead the Market with Global Reach, Chemical Expertise, and Sustainability-Driven Innovation
summary: This comprehensive analysis of the Potassium Formate Companies Quadrant delves into the global market for potassium formate, highlighting the top 10 businesses that lead the industry. Notable for its low environmental impact, potassium formate is favored in oil and gas drilling and as a de-icing agent. headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on Schlumberger Stock?
summary: Schlumberger has significantly underperformed the broader market over the past year, yet analysts remain strongly bullish on the stock’s long-term prospects.
